user_profile.goal: Lose fat, stay fit, and maintain a full, fresh face

details: Shower, light tasks, pack day items
Green tea or milk + 2 dates/roasted nuts
Quiet review, online class, or project work

workouts.title: Full Body Strength
workouts.description: Build overall strength with bodyweight exercises

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.description: Keep back straight, go down until thighs parallel to floor

exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: Full range of motion, modify on knees if needed

exercises.name: Glute bridges
exercises.description: Squeeze glutes at the top, hold for 2 seconds

exercises.name: Wall sit
exercises.description: Back against wall, thighs parallel to floor

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: Keep body straight from head to heels

workouts.title: Cardio + Core
workouts.description: Heart rate up with core strengthening

exercises.name: Jog in place
exercises.description: Light bounce, lift knees moderately high

exercises.name: High knees
exercises.description: Bring knees up to waist level, pump arms

exercises.name: Mountain climbers
exercises.description: Plank position, alternate bringing knees to chest

exercises.name: Bicycle crunch
exercises.description: Lying on back, alternate elbow to opposite knee

exercises.name: Side plank
exercises.description: Support body on forearm, keep hips up

exercises.name: Full body stretching
exercises.description: Focus on major muscle groups, hold each stretch 30 seconds

exercises.name: Walking or light yoga
exercises.description: Gentle movement, focus on breathing

exercises.name: Deep breathing
exercises.description: 4-7-8 breathing technique for relaxation

workouts.title: Upper Body Strength
workouts.description: Focus on arms, shoulders, and back

exercises.name: Incline push-ups
exercises.description: Hands on elevated surface, easier than regular push-ups

exercises.name: Shoulder taps
exercises.description: Plank position, tap opposite shoulder alternating

exercises.name: Superman hold
exercises.description: Lying face down, lift chest and legs simultaneously

exercises.name: Leg raises
exercises.description: Lying on back, lift straight legs to 90 degrees

exercises.name: Wall hand press
exercises.description: Stand arm's length from wall, push against it

workouts.title: Cardio Burn + Core
workouts.description: High intensity fat burning with core work

exercises.name: Jumping jacks
exercises.description: Full range of motion, land softly

exercises.name: Squat pulses
exercises.description: Stay in squat position, small up-down movements

exercises.name: Skater jumps
exercises.description: Lateral jumps, land on one foot, swing arms

exercises.name: Plank shoulder taps
exercises.description: Plank position, tap shoulders while keeping hips stable

workouts.title: Walk + Stretch + Face Yoga
workouts.description: Recovery with extended face yoga session

exercises.name: Walking session
exercises.description: Moderate pace, enjoy fresh air if possible

exercises.name: Deep stretching routine
exercises.description: Hold stretches longer, focus on tight areas

exercises.name: Extended face yoga
exercises.description: Complete face yoga routine with extra exercises

exercises.name: Complete rest
exercises.description: No structured exercise, focus on recovery

exercises.name: Light activities only
exercises.description: Gentle walking, light household chores

exercises.name: Recovery focus
exercises.description: Good nutrition, hydration, and sleep

items.notes: Avoid brinjal, giraula, parwal as per preference
Choose from: boiled egg, paneer, tofu, or chicken
Cucumber, carrot, onion, tomato - fresh and raw

midday_snack.title: Protein-rich Snack
midday_snack.instructions: Choose 1-2 options based on hunger and preference

evening_snack.title: Light Evening Snack
evening_snack.description: Optional light snack before dinner cutoff

face_yoga.name: Cheek Lifter
face_yoga.description: Smile, lift cheeks with fingers, hold 5 sec, release. Repeat.
steps: Place fingers on cheeks and gently lift

face_yoga.name: Jawline Definer
face_yoga.description: Tilt head back slightly, push jaw forward, hold 5 sec. Repeat.

face_yoga.name: Puff & Hold
face_yoga.description: Puff air into cheeks, hold for 10 sec, switch sides. Repeat.

face_yoga.name: Lip Pulls
face_yoga.description: Pull lower lip up, stretch neck muscles, hold 10 sec. Repeat.
face_yoga.benefits: Tones neck and chin area, reduces double chin
steps: Pull lower lip up as much as possible

face_yoga.name: Neck Massage
face_yoga.description: Gently massage jaw and neck upward with both hands

daily_reminders.tip: Keep a water bottle nearby during work

daily_reminders.reminder: Avoid sugar drinks and heavy salt
daily_reminders.tip: Replace sugary drinks with lemon water or green tea
Eggs, dal, paneer, chicken - include at least one
This is key for fat loss - stick to fluids only after 6 PM

daily_reminders.reminder: Sleep well - no screens 1 hour before bed
daily_reminders.tip: Read a book or do light stretching instead
Progress takes time - celebrate small wins daily

daily_tracker_tasks.title: No Junk/Sugar
daily_tracker_tasks.description: Avoided processed foods and added sugars

motivational_quotes: तपाईंको शरीर तपाईंको मन्दिर हो - यसको हेरचाह गर्नुहोस्।
स्वास्थ्य नै सबैभन्दा ठूलो सम्पत्ति हो।
हरेक दिन एक नयाँ सुरुवात हो।
Progress, not perfection - हरेक कदम महत्वपूर्ण छ।
Consistency is the key to transformation.
Your future self will thank you for today's choices.
